TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurface extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurface Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurface : IDisposable, IServiceProvider
type DesignSurface = class interface IDisposable interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 为设计组件提供一个用户界面。

span.span: Presents a user interface for designing components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现该用户视为设计器。The class implements what the user perceives as a designer. 是用户的用户界面操作以更改设计时功能。 is the user interface the user manipulates to change design-time features. 提供了一个完全独立的设计图面。 provides a completely self-contained design surface. 类可用作独立的设计器中，或它可能结合类来提供承载多个应用程序的常见实现对象。The class may be used as a stand-alone designer, or it may be coupled with the class to provide a common implementation for an application that hosts multiple objects. 类可以使用其本身而言，或者用户可以从其派生新类并增加的行为。The class can be used by itself, or the user can derive a new class from it and augment the behavior. 类自动提供多个设计时服务。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 类添加其所有服务在其构造函数中。The class adds all of its services in its constructor. 充分利用这些服务可以重写通过将它们替换为在受保护属性。Most of these services can be overridden by replacing them in the protected property. 若要替换服务，重写构造函数、 调用基类，并进行的更改通过受保护属性。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 所有服务添加到服务容器的且实现释放设计图面上时，将释放。All services that are added to the service container and that implement are disposed when the design surface is disposed. 默认的可替换集服务类提供了下表中所示。The default set of replaceable services that the class provides is shown in the following table. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||使不是容器的组件集合提供其自己的扩展程序提供程序的一部分的对象。Enables objects that are not part of the container’s components collection to provide their own extender providers.| ||由来获取扩展程序提供程序的列表。Used by to get a list of extender providers. 借助此服务，扩展程序提供程序可以在容器外实时。With this service, extender providers can live outside of the container.| ||提供设计器元数据的挂钩。Provides designer metadata hooks. 这是元数据筛选的主接口。This is the primary interface for metadata filtering.| ||提供了一种方法在设计器中选择组件。Provides a way to select components in the designer.| ||提供了一种方法获取对象的名称，即使这些对象没有就位。Provides a way to get a name for objects, even when those objects are not sited.| ||提供设计图面本身作为服务。Offers the design surface itself as a service.| ||提供用于获取和设置设计器选项值的基类。Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.| 下表显示了默认情况下提供的非可替换服务。The following table shows the non-replaceable services provided by default. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||对组件进行更改时，会引发事件。Raises events as changes are made to components.| ||控制对类型、 服务和事务访问。Controls access to types, services, and transactions. 面向设计人员的主接口。Master interface for designers.| ||拥有正在设计的组件的集。Owns the set of components that are being designed. 每个设计器有的主管组件。Each designer has an that owns the components.| ||派生自，并提供了一种方法来添加和移除服务从设计器。Derives from and provides a way to add and remove services from the designer.| 这些服务，除了类还提供可通过组件的站点的单个服务。In addition to these services, the class also provides a single service that is available through a component’s site. 此服务是唯一的每个组件。This service is unique for each component. 下表显示了不能替换的服务。The following table shows the services that cannot be replaced. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可以用于存储有关组件的任意数据的键/值对的泛型字典。A generic dictionary of key/value pairs that can be used to store arbitrary data about a component.| ||使组件可以将其他子组件添加到设计器的容器。A container that enables a component to add additional child components to the designer. 这些组件将在设计图面上，但不是会参与序列化。These components will be part of the design surface, but will not participate in serialization. 当你想要设计能够公开自己的设计器中，在一个区域的控件时，这很有用，但不是希望要参与序列化的区域。This is useful when you want to design a control that is capable of exposing a region of itself in a designer, but you do not want the region to participate in serialization.| 除了，该站点还可实现以下接口。In addition to , the site also implements the following interfaces. > [!CAUTION] > 检查存在这些接口，而不是使用不加选择地强制转换，因为其他站点实现未实现它们。Check for the existence of these interfaces, rather than use indiscriminate casting, because other site implementations may not implement them. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||提供了一种方法，若要访问的特定于站点的服务的容器。Provides a way to get to the container of site-specific services. 例如，是特定于站点的服务。For example, is a site-specific service. 借助此服务，可以添加其他特定于站点的服务。With this service, you can add additional site-specific services.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用构造函数，它会创建一个简单的设计器加载程序，进而创建给定类型的组件，然后结束加载过程。When you use the constructor, it creates a simple designer loader that, in turn, creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 这是到一种简单方式创建设计器中的，假定所有将外部完成保存状态。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 在内部，这将调用，并将传递的根组件类型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type. > [!NOTE] > 重载不会影响。The overload is not affected by . 设计图面上加载之前，必须在服务容器。The must be in the service container before the design surface loads. 如果需要访问，调用空构造函数，添加到，并调用与`rootComponentType`。If you need access to , call the empty constructor, add the to the and call with `rootComponentType`.

span.span: Begins the loading process with the given designer loader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因此加载可能会继续进行此调用返回后，可以是异步的设计器加载。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 附加到事件处理程序设计图面上已完成加载时要通知的事件。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 之后是调用，您可以立即获得该视图的设计器中，因为设计器加载程序必须提供至少根组件以异步方式加载时。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously.

summary.span: 开始加载过程。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`rootComponentType`指定，则只需创建的实例默认设计器加载程序`rootComponentType`将使用。When `rootComponentType` is specified, a default designer loader that simply creates an instance of `rootComponentType` will be used. 因此加载可能会继续进行此调用返回后，可以是异步的设计器加载。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 附加到事件处理程序设计图面上已完成加载时要通知的事件。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 之后是调用，您可以立即获得该视图的设计器中，因为设计器加载程序必须提供至少根组件以异步方式加载时。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously. > [!NOTE] > 方法创建组件类型的实例并初始化此实例的设计器。The method creates an instance of the component type and initializes a designer for this instance. 此方法返回之前引发事件。The event is raised before this method returns.

summary.span: 在将组件添加到容器时创建设计器。

span.span: Creates a designer when a component is added to the container.

returns.span: 所请求的设计器的实例，如果找不到匹配的设计器，则为 。

span.span: An instance of the requested designer, or if no matching designer could be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计图面上调用方法当一个组件添加到容器。The method is called by the design surface’s when a component is added to the container. 此方法创建设计器中，但不对其进行初始化。This method creates a designer, but does not initialize it. 它返回时，由容器初始化设计器。When it returns, the designer is initialized by the container. 可以创建两个不同类型的设计器： 根设计器和普通设计器。 can create two different types of designers: root designers and normal designers. 根设计器是用于在设计图面上，即通过定义添加到容器中的第一个组件中的根组件的设计器。A root designer is a designer for the root component in the design surface, which by definition is the first component added to the container. 根设计器不同于普通设计器，因为他们有责任向最终用户显示的用户界面。Root designers differ from normal designers because they are responsible for the user interface presented to the end user. 根设计器通常协调与设计图面上设计器，可提供此接口的其余部分。Root designers typically coordinate with the rest of the designers on a design surface to provide this interface. 此方法的默认实现委托给，并传入作为根设计器的设计器类型或作为普通设计器。The default implementation of this method delegates to , passing in as the designer type for root designers, or for normal designers. 您可以重写此方法来请求特定类型的设计器。You can override this method to request a specific type of designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将组件添加到嵌套容器创建其设计器，并使其符合条件的所有服务可从设计图面。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 组件添加到嵌套的容器不参与序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization.

The nested container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将组件添加到嵌套容器创建其设计器，并使其符合条件的所有服务可从设计图面。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 组件添加到嵌套的容器不参与序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization. 你可以提供其他名称方法并传递到值`containerName`。You can provide an additional name for the method by passing a value into `containerName`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公众方法遵循标准模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法将销毁设计图面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 此方法的受保护的版本是`virtual`，它遵循普通模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因为没有任何本机代码以清理，它不具有终结器调用。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果您需要调用，必须自行添加一个终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公众方法遵循标准模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法将销毁设计图面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 此方法的受保护的版本是`virtual`，它遵循普通模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因为没有任何本机代码以清理，它不具有终结器调用。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果您需要调用，必须自行添加一个终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 在释放设计图面时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the design surface is disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在图面是已释放的时，才公开方法调用。The surface is only disposed when the public method on is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 序列化对设计图面的更改。

span.span: Serializes changes to the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用方法来将推送到设计图面下序列化程序所做的更改。The method can be called to push changes made to the design surface down to the serializer. 这可确保在设计图面和其序列化的状态同步。This ensures that the design surface and its serialized state are synchronized. 此方法的实际实现转发到与设计图面关联的设计器加载程序。The actual implementation of this method is forwarded to the designer loader associated with design surface. 设计器加载程序可以选择将更改推迟到调用时，它也可能选择以保持的序列化的数据的最新的所有用户更改。The designer loader may choose to defer changes until is called, or it may choose to keep the serialized data up to date with all user changes. 方法可确保，而不考虑在模型设计器加载程序选择使用的序列化的状态同步与实际的设计图面。The method ensures that regardless of the model the designer loader chooses to use, the serialized state is synchronized with the actual design surface.

summary.span: 调用 的 方法时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a call is made to the method of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，刷新设计器加载程序，然后引发事件。The designer loader is flushed first, and then the event is raised.

returns.span: 实现 或作为其派生类的对象，如果服务容器中不存在该服务，则为 。

span.span: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, , or if the service does not exist in the service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索设计图面上的服务容器中的服务。The method retrieves a service in the design surface’s service container. 此外，这会将转发到任何服务提供程序在构造时提供给设计图面。In addition, this will forward to any service provider that was given to the design surface at construction time.

span.span: if the design surface is currently loaded; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在设计器加载完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the designer load has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 来成功加载，以及不成功的引发事件。The event is raised for successful loads as well as unsuccessful ones. 如果此事件处理程序中的代码引发异常，在设计器将被卸载。If code in this event handler throws an exception, the designer is unloaded. 对象可以用于确定加载是否成功，而且它还可以提供加载期间发生的错误的列表。The object can be used to determine if loading succeeded, and it can also provide a list of errors that occurred during the load. > [!NOTE] > 前提是可以容忍错误，序列化系统，以及成功加载的情况下可能发生错误。Errors can occur for successful loads as well, provided that the serialization system can tolerate errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceContainer As ServiceContainer

summary.span: 获取服务容器。

span.span: Gets the service container.

value.span: 为设计图面中包含的设计器提供所有服务的服务容器。

span.span: The service container that provides all services to designers contained within the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造时将默认服务添加到此服务容器。At construction time, adds default services into this service container. 您可以将默认服务保留在其当前状态，也可以将其删除并替换为您自己。You can leave the default services in their present state, or you can remove them and replace them with your own. 默认服务是所有按需创建，因此中用于添加在构造时性能不会丢失。The default services are all demand-created, so there is no loss in performance for adding them at construction time.

exception.span: 附加到 的 已被释放。

span.span: The attached to the has been disposed.

summary.span: 在设计器完成卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a designer has finished unloading.

summary.span: 在设计器将要卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a designer is about to unload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器中卸载，将销毁该设计器的整个状态，包括设计器的视图。When a designer unloads, the entire state for that designer is destroyed, including the designer’s view. 此时，该视图应该是没有父级。The view should be unparented at this time.

span.span: Occurs when the method has been called on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要支持方法中，事件处理程序应激活此设计图面上的窗口。If you want to support the method, your event handler should activate the window for this design surface.
